intro: Your task is to respond to Mr Singh who is experiencing moderate shoulder pain following a fall. Assess his pain level, understand its impact, and escalate appropriately to nursing staff while providing comfort measures within your scope of practice.
description_html:
This scenario focuses on pain assessment and appropriate escalation. Mr Singh is experiencing moderate shoulder pain after a fall, which requires careful assessment and nursing involvement.

Learning objectives:

  • Use pain scales to assess severity
  • Recognize when pain requires escalation
  • Provide comfort measures within scope of practice
  • Understand medication limitations as a care assistant
  • Document pain reports accurately

resident.name: Mr Singh
goals: link pain to fall last week
report medication helps but wears off

safety.if_red_flag_then: escalate to nurse, provide reassurance, offer comfort measures

actions.title: Position pillow for support
actions.prompt: You carefully position a pillow under Mr Singh's arm to support his shoulder and reduce the strain.

actions.title: Contact nurse
actions.prompt: You inform Mr Singh that you'll contact the nurse right away to review his pain and medication needs.

actions.title: Offer comfort position
actions.prompt: You help Mr Singh find a more comfortable seated position that doesn't put pressure on his injured shoulder.
